statements: DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
DELETE FROM ResearchParticipants WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM SensorDataArchive WHERE device_id = 100 AND sensor_type = 'temperature';
DELETE FROM ResearchSubjects WHERE age > 50 AND condition = 'healthy';
DELETE FROM device WHERE id = 3 OR device_name = 'SensorA';
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE data_id = 1 AND sensor_type = 'Temperature';
DELETE FROM project_data WHERE project_id = 2 AND data_type = 'Health';
